title: [SRE and SRA Recruiting] [OCE] Looking many roles, message fast!
body:
Hey all,
I'm the manager for Storm Raisers Esports, and we're currently looking for a High Silver - Gold Support and Top laner willing to play for our team. Please message me fast as we have a few games very soon. Storm Raisers Academy is also recruiting and we're looking for a new Top laner and a few substitutes, SRA is ranked around Bronze - Silver. Thank you all for your time! :)
~ Mr Zeroxs, Storm Raisers Esports Manager.

Add my Discord to get into contact ASAP:
Pepe#1194

replies.body:
Hello, add me on discord to talk into depth about It. Thanks.
FYI, your discord add isn't working if interested here's mine ; Max#3887

Hey there, I'm currently unranked but shooting through my level 30 grind. Varying on my placements afterwards, and the rank I get, maybe I could get in contact with you about joining Academy, maybe as an ADC sub. 

Thank for reading!

Hi there, I'm expressing interest as a support main.

IGN - LexyTheDeer
Discord: Lexy#2741 
Op.GG: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=lexythedeer (Easy Reading) 

I couldn't add you on discord, as it's incorrect. 

Thank's for having a peak.
